snippet: The review will be the first time anyone outside the district attorney’s office has examined the complaints of dubious investigative techniques against the former detective, Louis Scarcella.
abstract: State Supreme Court justice orders Brooklyn district attorney's office to produce any documents regarding allegations of wrongdoing against former New York City Detective Louis Scarcella; Shabaka Shakur, serving life sentence for murder, requested documents in quest to prove his conviction was based on shoddy work by Scarcella; will be first time anyone outside district attorney's office has examined files.
lead_paragraph: The review will be the first time anyone outside the district attorney’s office has examined the complaints of dubious investigative techniques against the former detective, Louis Scarcella.

headline.main: Judge to Review Files on Brooklyn Detective Scarcella
headline.print_headline: Judge to Review Files on Brooklyn Detective
